Docs.summary: Defines methods that an external COM object must implement. This interface is used by an external COM implementation to expose its objects to JScript because JScript needs a managed to bind to an external object. This interface is implemented by , , and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo GetCOMMemberInfo() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a class, gets a managed object that enables JScript to communicate with an external COM member.
Docs.returns: A managed object that enables JScript to communicate with an external COM member.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Initialize (string name, Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo dispatch);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class Microsoft.JScript.COMMemberInfo dispatch) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the external COM member.
Information that enables JScript to call, get, and set the external COM member.
Docs.summary: When implemented in a class, initializes the information that enables JScript to communicate with the specified external COM member.
